alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 5:36PM AKDT until April 02 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions will be near the Bering Strait. Conditions have improved briefly this afternoon as winds decreased, but conditions will get worse again this evening as winds turn north and increase again. Conditions will improve late Sunday morning as winds taper off.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
